attributes.action: pay the british armed forces a higher wage and cut their taxes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: pay the armed forces a better wage or let the british service personel pay less tax, we all know that the taxpayers pay the forces wages so why do armed forces personel pay their own wages? if you wont give lower taxes or higher pay then give them free housing /accomodation

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
